BronzeSlime.NAME: Split: Bronze
BronzeSlime.DESCRIPTION: Split into a Bronze Slime. NL Exhaust
BronzeSlime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Split into a Bronze Slime twice. NL Exhaust

TorchHeadSlime.NAME: Split: Torch-Head
TorchHeadSlime.DESCRIPTION: Split into a Torch-Head Slime. NL Exhaust
TorchHeadSlime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Split into a Torch-Head Slime twice. NL Exhaust

AttackSlime.NAME: Split: Attacking
AttackSlime.DESCRIPTION: Split into an Attacking Slime. NL Exhaust
AttackSlime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Split into a Attacking Slime twice. NL Exhaust

CultistSlime.NAME: Split: Cultist
CultistSlime.DESCRIPTION: Split into a Cultist Slime. NL Exhaust
CultistSlime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Split into a Cultist Slime twice. NL Exhaust

DebuffSlime.NAME: Split: Weakening
DebuffSlime.DESCRIPTION: Split into a Weakening Slime. NL Exhaust
DebuffSlime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Split into a Weakening Slime twice. NL Exhaust

PoisonSlime.NAME: Split: Poisoning
PoisonSlime.DESCRIPTION: Split into a Poisoning Slime. NL Exhaust
PoisonSlime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Split into a Poisoning Slime twice. NL Exhaust

SlimingSlime.NAME: Split: Sliming
SlimingSlime.DESCRIPTION: Split into a Sliming Slime. NL Exhaust
SlimingSlime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Split into a Sliming Slime twice. NL Exhaust

SlimeSacrifice.NAME: Protect the Boss
SlimeSacrifice.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would damaged by an Attack, losing your oldest Slime instead. NL Exhaust
SlimeSacrifice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next 2 times you would damaged by an Attack, losing your oldest Slime instead. NL Exhaust

DuplicateSlimes.NAME: Replication
DuplicateSlimes.DESCRIPTION: Duplicate all of your spawned Slimes. NL Exhaust

DuplicateCard.NAME: Replication
DuplicateCard.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. Add a copy of that card to your hand. NL Exhaust

AbsorbAll.NAME: Absorption
AbsorbAll.DESCRIPTION: Absorb all of your spawned Slimes.  Gain 3 Block per slime Absorbed.

AbsorbAllPotency.NAME: Knowledge Pool
AbsorbAllPotency.DESCRIPTION: Absorb all of your spawned Slimes.  Gain either 1 Potency, 1 Strength, or 1 Dexterity for each Slime Absorbed. NL Exhaust

RandomSlimeCard.NAME: Split
RandomSlimeCard.DESCRIPTION: Split into a random slime. NL Exhaust

RandomSlimeCard4.NAME: Super Split
RandomSlimeCard4.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Slime slots. NL Split into a random slime four times. NL Exhaust
RandomSlimeCard4.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Slime slots. NL Split into a random slime four times. NL Exhaust

SplittingStrike.NAME: Divide & Conquer
SplittingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Split into a random slime. NL Exhaust
SplittingStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Split into two random slimes. NL Exhaust

SplitForLess.NAME: Lead By Example
SplitForLess.DESCRIPTION: The first Attack you play each turn also causes your oldest slime to Attack.
SplitForLess.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first !M! Attacks you play each turn also cause your oldest slime to Attack.

SlimeTap.NAME: Slime Tap
SlimeTap.DESCRIPTION: Absorb your oldest Slime.  Gain [E] and draw 2 cards. NL Exhaust
SlimeTap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Absorb up to 2 of your oldest Slimes.  Gain [E] and draw 2 cards for each Absorbed. NL Exhaust

Coordinated.NAME: Teamwork
Coordinated.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Trigger your oldest Slime's attack X times. NL Exhaust
Coordinated.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Trigger your oldest Slime's attack X times.

SlimeBarrage.NAME: Slime Barrage
SlimeBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Trigger all of your Slime's attacks.

AllTogetherNow.NAME: Slime Brawl
AllTogetherNow.DESCRIPTION: Play and Exhaust the top card of your draw pile. Repeat for each of your spawned Slimes. NL Exhaust

QuickSpikes.NAME: Quick Spikes
QuickSpikes.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! Thorns. NL Lose !M! Thorns at the start of your next turn.

SlimeBlockade.NAME: Form A Blockade
SlimeBlockade.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, plus !M! Block for each spawned Slime.

LeechingTouch.NAME: Leeching Touch
LeechingTouch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  Gain Block equal to unblocked damage.

Dissolve.NAME: Dissolve
Dissolve.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all cards in your hand. Gain !B! Block and heal !M! HP for each card Exhausted. NL Exhaust

DuplicatedForm.NAME: Duplicated Form
DuplicatedForm.DESCRIPTION: Become Halved. NL Gain [E] and draw 1 card each turn. NL The first card you play each turn that targets enemies is played twice.
DuplicatedForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Become Halved. NL Gain [E] and draw 1 card each turn. NL The first 2 cards you play each turn that targets enemies is played twice.

Recollect.NAME: Recollect
Recollect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Return a random 0-cost Exhausted card to your hand.
Recollect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Return 2 random 0-cost Exhausted cards to your hand.

GrowingTendril.NAME: Growth Punch
GrowingTendril.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Increase these effects permanently by !M!. NL Exhaust

Recycling.NAME: Recycling
Recycling.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, return an Exhausted 0-cost card to your hand.
Recycling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, return an Exhausted 0-cost card to your hand.

MorphCard.NAME: Repurpose
MorphCard.DESCRIPTION: Transform a card in your hand and reduce its cost by 1 for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust
MorphCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Transform up to 2 cards in your hand and reduce their costs by 1 for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust

BodyBlow.NAME: Slime Slam
BodyBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal 9 damage plus your Block. (Deals !D! damage). NL Lose all Block.
BodyBlow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 9 damage plus twice your Block. (Deals !D! damage). NL Lose all Block.

MorphEverything.NAME: Mass Repurpose
MorphEverything.DESCRIPTION: Transform all cards in your hand. Reduce their costs by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust

MultiLick.NAME: SO TASTY!
MultiLick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times. Add X random Lick cards to your hand. NL Exhaust

RapidHeal.NAME: Regenerate
RapidHeal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Regen. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust

Lick.NAME: Lick
Lick.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimePoison! Weak and !M! Slimed. NL Exhaust

SlimedLick.NAME: Haunting Lick
SlimedLick.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Vulnerable and !M! Slimed. NL Exhaust
SlimedLick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and 3 Slimed. NL Exhaust

PoisonLick.NAME: Poison Lick
PoisonLick.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Slimed and !M! Poison. NL Exhaust

MegaLick.NAME: Mega-Lick
MegaLick.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimePoison! Weak and !M! Slimed to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust

FocusedLick.NAME: Focused Lick
FocusedLick.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Weak and Poison, replacing them with Slimed. NL Apply !M! Slimed.
FocusedLick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove all Weak and Poison, replacing them with Slimed. NL Apply !M! Slimed.

SamplingLick.NAME: Quick Lick
SamplingLick.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Slimed. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust

Gluttony.NAME: Gluttony
Gluttony.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Lick card to your hand each turn.
Gluttony.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Add a random Lick card to your hand each turn.

StrikeWeakPoint.NAME: Cull the Weak
StrikeWeakPoint.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy has Weak, trigger your oldest slime's attack.
StrikeWeakPoint.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy has Weak, trigger your oldest slime's attack, then repeat if it has Poison.

StrikeFrailPoint.NAME: Cull the Frail
StrikeFrailPoint.DESCRIPTION: If the target is Frail, remove all of their Block, then remove 1 Frail. NL Deal !D! damage.

SickeningTendril.NAME: Diseased Tendril
SickeningTendril.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison.  Poison amount is increased by the target's Slimed as if it were damage.

TongueLash.NAME: Tongue Lash
TongueLash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  Deals !M! additional damage for ALL of your cards containing "Lick".

LooksTasty.NAME: It Looks Tasty
LooksTasty.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  Add a random Lick card to your hand if the target was Slimed.
LooksTasty.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  Add two random Lick cards to your hand if the target was Slimed.

AcidTongue.NAME: Acid Tongue
AcidTongue.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison whenever you apply Weak or Slimed.
AcidTongue.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Apply !M! Poison whenever you apply Weak or Slimed.

TendrilStrike.NAME: Tendril Strike
TendrilStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If the enemy has Weak AND Poison, remove 1 of each and return this to your hand (once per turn).
TendrilStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If the enemy has Weak AND Poison, remove 1 of each and return this to your hand (twice per turn).

AccelerateToxins.NAME: Accelerate Toxins
AccelerateToxins.DESCRIPTION: For each Poisoned enemy, trigger the Poison's effect. NL Exhaust
AccelerateToxins.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For each Poisoned enemy, trigger the Poison's effect twice. NL Exhaust

RandomBossCard.NAME: Quick Study
RandomBossCard.DESCRIPTION: Add a random powerful Boss card to your hand. NL Exhaust

Overexertion.NAME: Waste Not
Overexertion.DESCRIPTION: Return all 0-cost Exhausted cards to your hand. NL Exhaust

Prepare.NAME: Prepare
Prepare.DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] and draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust
Prepare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] and draw !M! cards. NL Retain up to !M! cards this turn. Exhaust

Grow.NAME: Grow
Grow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity. NL Reduce this card's cost by 1.

Tackle.NAME: Hungry Tackle
Tackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SelfDamage! damage to yourself. NL Return a random 0-cost Exhausted card to your hand.
Tackle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SelfDamage! damage to yourself. NL Return 2 random 0-cost Exhausted cards to your hand.

FinishingTackle.NAME: Finishing Tackle
FinishingTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SelfDamage! damage to yourself. NL If this kills an enemy, gain !B! Block.

SlimesplosionOLD.NAME: Slimesplosion
SlimesplosionOLD.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Slimed and !SlimePoison! Poison to ALL enemies X times. NL Exhaust

Slimesplosion.NAME: Living Wall
Slimesplosion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Slimed to attackers this turn. NL Exhaust

Slimepotheosis.NAME: Slimepotheosis
Slimepotheosis.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all cards in your hand. Lose !M! HP for each card Upgraded. NL Exhaust.

QuickTackle.NAME: Combo Tackle
QuickTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SelfDamage! damage to yourself. NL Upgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of combat.

CorrosiveTackle.NAME: Goop Tackle
CorrosiveTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SelfDamage! damage to yourself. NL Add a random Attack card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

SuperTackle.NAME: Chomp
SuperTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Heal HP equal to unblocked damage. NL Exhaust

FlameTackle.NAME: Flame Tackle
FlameTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SelfDamage! damage to yourself. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust

PoisonTackle.NAME: Venom Tackle
PoisonTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SelfDamage! damage to yourself. NL Apply !M! Poison.

TendrilFlail.NAME: Rain of Goop
TendrilFlail.DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 Slimed to a random enemy !M! times. NL Exhaust
TendrilFlail.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 Slimed to a random enemy !M! times.

GoopSpray.NAME: Goop Spray
GoopSpray.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Slimed and 3 Poison to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust
GoopSpray.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Slimed and 5 Poison to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust

MassFeed.NAME: Mass Feed
MassFeed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If this kills a non-minion enemy, raise your Max HP by !M!. NL Exhaust.

SelfDamageSlimed.NAME: Stray Goop
SelfDamageSlimed.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Slimed to a random enemy whenever you lose HP on your turn.

TendrilSlash.NAME: Slime Smash
TendrilSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage.  This gains twice the normal benefit from Slimed.

LeechEnergy.NAME: Leech Energy
LeechEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain [E] if the target has Weak, then repeat if it has Poison.

Leech.NAME: Leech Life
Leech.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust

Retaliate.NAME: Equalize
Retaliate.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to half of your missing HP. (Deals !D! damage).

RollThrough.NAME: Roll Through
RollThrough.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL Slimed enemies.

ViolentStop.NAME: Disrupting Slam
ViolentStop.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Enemies who do not intend to attack are struck twice.

ChargeUp.NAME: Charge Up
ChargeUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL On your next turn, gain !M! Strength. NL Ethereal, Exhaust

GuardianWhirl.NAME: Guardian Whirl
GuardianWhirl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 4 times. NL Ethereal, Exhaust

DefensiveMode.NAME: Defensive Mode
DefensiveMode.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns. NL Gain !B! Block, and another !B! Block next turn. NL Ethereal, Exhaust

PrepareSlimeCrush.NAME: Prepare: Crush
PrepareSlimeCrush.DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] and !M! Strength, and add SLIME CRUSH to your hand. NL Exhaust
PrepareSlimeCrush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] [E] and !M! Strength, and add SLIME CRUSH to your hand. NL Exhaust

SlimeCrush.NAME: SLIME CRUSH!!!
SlimeCrush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Skip your next turn. NL Exhaust, Ethereal

HexSlime.NAME: Ghostflame
HexSlime.DESCRIPTION: Gain Slime Slots until you have 6. NL Spawn a Ghostflame Slime at the start of each turn for the next !M! turns. NL Ethereal
HexSlime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Slime Slots until you have 6. NL Split into two Ghostflame Slimes. If you have at least 6, Absorb all Slimes. NL Ethereal, Exhaust

PrepareDivider.NAME: Prepare: Divide
PrepareDivider.DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] and !M! Strength, and add Divide to your hand. NL Ethereal, Exhaust
PrepareDivider.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] [E] and !M! Strength, and add Divide to your hand. NL Ethereal, Exhaust

Divider.NAME: Divide
Divider.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. Each enemy hit takes a 1 additional damage every turn.  NL Ethereal, Exhaust

PrepareBeam.NAME: Prepare: Beam
PrepareBeam.DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] and !M! Strength, and add Hyper Beam to your hand. NL Ethereal, Exhaust
PrepareBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] [E] and !M! Strength, and add Hyper Beam to your hand. NL Ethereal, Exhaust

SlimeHyperBeam.NAME: Hyper Beam
SlimeHyperBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Ethereal, Exhaust

Flail.NAME: Flail
Flail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Ethereal, Exhaust

DefensiveStance.NAME: Defensive Stance
DefensiveStance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Block at the end of each turn. NL Ethereal

FaceSlap.NAME: Face Slap
FaceSlap.DESCRIPTION: Remove all of the target's Block. NL Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Ethereal, Exhaust

LastStand.NAME: Last Stand
LastStand.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Debuffs. NL Gain !M! Strength, or !SlimePoison! Strength if you are below half HP. NL Ethereal

Collect.NAME: Collect
Collect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and !M! Potency. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Ethereal, Exhaust

YouAreMine.NAME: YOU ARE MINE!
YouAreMine.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies and remove all of their Block. NL Ethereal, Exhaust

DoubleEverything.NAME: Ooze Bath
DoubleEverything.DESCRIPTION: Double an enemy's Slimed. NL Exhaust
DoubleEverything.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double an enemy's Poison and Slimed. NL Exhaust

SlimeRitual.NAME: CA-CAW!
SlimeRitual.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength each turn. NL Ethereal

DarkVoid.NAME: Dark Void
DarkVoid.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. This combat, each enemy receives 10% more damage for each card played in a turn. NL Ethereal, Exhaust

Ripple.NAME: Time Ripple
Ripple.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable and Weak to ALL enemies. NL Ethereal, Exhaust

HeadSlam.NAME: Head Slam
HeadSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Stun the enemy if they are not a Boss. NL Ethereal, Exhaust

StopTime.NAME: Stop Time
StopTime.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played as the first card in a turn. Gain !M! Strength. NL Stun all enemies, then end your turn. NL Ethereal, Exhaust
StopTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Can only be played as the first card in a turn. Gain !M! Strength. NL Stun all enemies, then end your turn. NL Ethereal, Exhaust

CircleOfPower.NAME: Donu's Power
CircleOfPower.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength and 1 Artifact. NL Add a random Attack card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Ethereal, Exhaust

SquareOfProtection.NAME: Deca's Protection
SquareOfProtection.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity and 3 Plated Armor. NL Add a random Power card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Ethereal, Exhaust

PolyBeam.NAME: Poly Beam
PolyBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Damage is increased by 1 for each Power played this combat (Played !M! Powers). NL Ethereal, Exhaust

Sear.NAME: Sear
Sear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Enemy takes an additional !M! damage every turn this combat. NL Ethereal, Exhaust

StudyAutomaton.NAME: Study Automaton
StudyAutomaton.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Automaton card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
StudyAutomaton.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Automaton card to your hand at the start of each turn.

StudyRandomBoss.NAME: Study the Spire
StudyRandomBoss.DESCRIPTION: Add a random powerful Boss card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
StudyRandomBoss.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random powerful Upgraded Boss card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.

StudyAwakened.NAME: Study Awakened
StudyAwakened.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Awakened One card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
StudyAwakened.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Awakened One card to your hand at the start of each turn.

StudyChamp.NAME: Study the Champ
StudyChamp.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Champ card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
StudyChamp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Champ card to your hand at the start of each turn.

StudyCollector.NAME: Study Collector
StudyCollector.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Collector card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
StudyCollector.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Collector card to your hand at the start of each turn.

StudyGuardian.NAME: Study Guardian
StudyGuardian.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Guardian card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
StudyGuardian.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Guardian card to your hand at the start of each turn.

StudyHexaghost.NAME: Study Hexaghost
StudyHexaghost.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Hexaghost card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
StudyHexaghost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Hexaghost card to your hand at the start of each turn.

StudyShapes.NAME: Study Donu & Deca
StudyShapes.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Donu & Deca card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
StudyShapes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Donu & Deca card to your hand at the start of each turn.

StudyTimeEater.NAME: Study Time Eater
StudyTimeEater.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Time Eater card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns.
StudyTimeEater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Time Eater card to your hand at the start of each turn.
